ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 110 05 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 110 05 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would only recommend a yearlong essay to another student if they are pretty serious about a big undertaking - it is big. I think that EP&E should probably have a more flexible page minimum; there's very little that you can say in 80 pages that you can't in 65 (what many other yearlong essays have as a maximum, not a minimum), especially if a large part of your research is data analysis.Having said that, it's obviously fun for all the right reasons - getting to have an extended academic experience, pursuing a single topic in depth - if you're into that sort of thing.Also, pick a topic that you really like, not just one that you can have a good adviser for. You have to want to sit down and write dozens of pages on it multiple times.
